_header: Of all the crafts ought blessed be the plow
_description: ‘The Plowman’s Song’, a pseudo-Chaucerian balade — two stanzas rhyme royal

BLAdd16165.First Lines:
Of alle þe crafftes oute blessed be þe plougheSo mury it
                    is to holde to by hinde…
BLAdd16165.Last Lines:
…Ageyns þe hil tpruk in tpruk out I calleFor of my
                    ploughe þe best stotte is balle
